headline: Baxter International (BAX): Valuation Check After U.S. National Security Probe Rattles Medical Device Sector
summary: If you are holding or eyeing shares of Baxter International (BAX), the latest shakeup in the medical device sector probably has your attention. The U.S. Commerce Department’s new national security investigation has introduced significant uncertainty for companies that rely on imports for essential products like syringes and infusion pumps. With the potential for new import duties in play, the big question now is how these changes might ripple through Baxter’s supply chain and affect its...
